mapper.select: select count(*) as value,stage as name from tbl_tran group by stage

select tran.id, user.name as owner, tran.money, tran.name, tran.expectedDate, customer.name as customerId, tran.stage, tran.type, tran.source, activity.name as activityId, contacts.fullname as contactsId, tran.createBy, tran.createTime, tran.editBy, tran.editTime, tran.description, tran.contactSummary, tran.nextContactTime from tbl_tran tran join tbl_user user on tran.owner=user.id join tbl_customer customer on tran.customerId=customer.id left join tbl_activity activity on tran.activityId=activity.id left join tbl_contacts contacts on tran.contactsId=contacts.id
where tran.id=#{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_tran ( id, owner, money, name, expectedDate, customerId, stage, type, source, activityId, contactsId, createBy, createTime, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime
) values ( #{id}, #{owner}, #{money}, #{name}, #{expectedDate}, #{customerId}, #{stage}, #{type}, #{source}, #{activityId}, #{contactsId}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{description}, #{contactSummary}, #{nextContactTime} );
